name: Detective Secrets Solitaire. The Curse of the Village
name_original: Detective Secrets Solitaire. The Curse of the Village
description:
Being a good detective requires persistence, discretion, and insight. Having all of those, Detective Scott managed to build a successful career. One day a mysterious client approaches him with a seemingly simple request: go to a remote deserted village and find the client's grandmother. The Detective has no idea of the ancient curse hanging over the village, and the dangers he'll have to face!

Complete 200 card layouts of varying difficulty, help the Detective crack the case and break the curse plaguing the village!

- A complex story with intriguing characters!
- A unique solitaire game with a mysterious story!
- Mystical village atmosphere!
- Ramp up combos and gain bonuses!
- Many different bonuses and buffs!
- Learn about the curse threatening the village!
- 200 fantastic card layouts!
- Challenge yourself by overcoming various obstacles!
